Name: Alia Holimion
Trait: Friends and family perished, tragically, before my eyes. I hope never to undergo that again.
Ideal: Freedom. Those who are enslaved and unjustly imprisoned deserve my aid. (Good)
Bond: I was separated from a loved one during my escape from town. I will find them.
Flaw: I relentlessly despise the Maimed Virulence and his allies. I’d abandon other goals in order to strike out at them.
Equipment: ['Greatclub', 'Component Pouch', "Dungeoneer's Pack", 'Leather Armor', 'Sickle', '2 Daggers', '20 Caltrops', 'Small Trinket of a Previous Life', "Healer's Kit", 'Set of Dark Common Clothes with a Cloak and Hood', '5 GP']

Name: Katya Pytch
Trait: My life is full of dance, song, drink, and love.
Ideal: Loyal. My word, once given, is my bond. (Lawful)
Bond: Wealth and power are nothing. Fulfillment can only be found in artistic expression.
Flaw: I must have what I want and will brook no delay.
Equipment: ['Mace', 'Light Crossbow', 'Light Crossbow', '20 Bolts', 'Scale Mail', "Thieves' Tools", "Dungeoneer's Pack", "Set of Artisan's Tools or Musical Instrument", 'Set of Fine Clothes', '10 GP']

Name: Miglan Ironsmith
Trait: When I see others struggling, I offer to help.
Ideal: People. I strive to inspire my spectators. (Neutral)
Bond: My mistake got someone hurt. Ill never make that mistake again.
Flaw: I ignore anyone who doesn't compete and anyone who loses to me.
Equipment: ['Pike', 'Shield', '5 Javelins', "Explorer's Pack", 'Chain Mail', 'Holy Symbol', 'Bronze Discus or Leather Ball', 'Lucky Charm or Past Trophy', "Set of Traveler's Clothes", '10 GP']

Name: Phelaia Cooper
Trait: I resent the rich and enjoy thwarting their plans and spoiling their fun in small ways.
Ideal: Salty. I want people to look to me as an expert on plying Mulmaster Harbor. (Any)
Bond: The Cloaks killed my friend for spellcasting. I'll get them back somehow, someday.
Flaw: I almost always cheat. I can't help myself.
Equipment: ['Whip', 'Rapier', 'Sickle', "Explorer's Pack", 'Chain Mail', 'Holy Symbol', 'Fishing Tackle', 'Dice Set', 'Playing Cards', 'Set of Common Clothes', 'Rowboat', '5 GP']

Name: Brianna Cash
Trait: I sleep with my back to a wall or tree, with everything I own wrapped in a bundle in my arms.
Ideal: Change. The low are lifted up, and the high and mighty are brought down. Change is the nature of things. (Chaotic)
Bond: I sponsor an orphanage to keep others from enduring what I was forced to endure.
Flaw: People who can't take care of themselves get what they deserve.
Equipment: ['Shortsword', "Dungeoneer's Pack", '10 Darts', 'Small Knife', 'Map of Home City', 'Token to Remember Parents', 'Set of Common Clothes', '10 GP']
Race Source: Eberron: Rising from the Last War

Name: Maeson Pyckes
Trait: I always want to know how things work and what makes people tick.
Ideal: Greed. I'm only in it for the money. (Evil)
Bond: I pursue wealth to secure someone's love.
Flaw: I would kill to acquire a noble title.
Spells Known: ['Shape Water', 'Shillelagh', 'Cure Wounds', 'Wild Cunning (UA)', 'Animal Friendship', 'Detect Magic', 'Healing Word']
Equipment: ['Wooden Shield', 'Quarterstaff', 'Leather Armor', "Explorer's Pack", 'Druidic Focus', 'Set of Fine Clothes', '5 GP']
Race Source: Eberron: Rising from the Last War

Name: Ariella Tumbleweed
Trait: I'm rude to people who lack my commitment to hard work and fair play.
Ideal: Generosity. My talents were given to me so that I could use them to benefit the world. (Good)
Bond: The workshop where I learned my trade is the most important place in the world to me.
Flaw: No one must ever learn that I once stole money from clan coffers.
Equipment: ['Club', "Dungeoneer's Pack", '10 Darts', "Set of Artisan's Tools", 'Chisel to Mark your Handiwork', "Set of Traveler's Clothes", 'Gem worth 10 GP', '5 GP']
